title: Dipole operators in Fierz identities. (arXiv:2211.01379v1 [hep-ph])
description: We study the contribution from dipole operators to one-loop Fierz identities and provide the resulting QCD and QED shifts to the tree-level relations for all four-fermion operators. The results simplify one-loop basis changes as well as matching computations and allow one to consistently eliminate operators from an operator basis which give rise to complications, e.g. traces involving $\gamma_5$.
dc:creator: Jason Aebischer, Marko Pesut, Zachary Polonsky
